title: Ciężarówką przez Route 66
overview: The most famous truck driver Dawid Andres sets off on another journey! This time on the legendary US road - Route 66! The legendary Route 66 was one of the most important roads connecting the western and eastern shores of the United States. In 1985 it was removed from the list of highways. Currently, it is a world-famous tourist attraction. Dawid Andres will cover almost 4,000 kilometers from Chicago to Los Angeles. What does this iconic road look like from his perspective? Together with David, viewers will travel through as many as 8 states. In each of them, many surprises await the host of the Discovery Channel. Driving a truck on this famous route will not be the easiest. The constant weight limitation or the inability to cross many bridges are only some of the difficulties. How will David's journey end? Will he find out where the phenomenon of one of the most famous routes in the world comes from?
